FuncDef: The radius-server nas-identifier-format command sets the encapsulation format of the NAS-Identifier attribute. The undo radius-server nas-identifier-format command restores the default encapsulation format of the NAS-Identifier attribute. By default, the NAS-Identifier attribute encapsulation format is the device's hostname.

ParaDef.Info:
Sets the encapsulation format of NAS-Identifier to a device's host name.
-

Sets the encapsulation format of NAS-Identifier to a user's VLAN ID.
-
